prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered standing pose with one hand raised holding an ethereal lantern, other hand in contemplative gesture, chibi proportions with large translucent multi-faceted geometric head with unique octahedron structure suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying fractal. Hair or geometric appendages incorporating octahedron, fractal spiral, merkaba patterns, styled with commands empyrean influences. Outfit is unique: neutral grey inspired by Silver and mid-grey with cool undertones inspired by azure ethereal flowing robes with geometric wind patterns with flat with sharpie-style lines for depth and movement, elaborate with shifting Air element glyphs and spiral motifs and octahedron emblem on chest; texture flat with sharpie-style lines for depth. Include subtle accessory like caduceus of communication with intertwined geometric serpents with fractal spiraling energy emanations. Environmental effect: sacred geometric field creating geometric aura patterns around the character with subtle magical essence emanations like faint wind wisps and floating geometric particles. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on Governor TOTOCAN's profile: 'He who drives the cycles', Aethyr CHR, Air element, Tarot The Hermit, Sephirot Hod, Zodiac Virgo, embodying the essence: 'In TOTOCAN's presence, all things align into steady cadence each moment regulated by a persistent, calming rhythm that never falters.' Resolution 512x512, optimized for layering in Enochian Cyphers game and WebGL rendering with TAP hypertoken metadata embedding.

visual_elements.pose: front-facing centered standing pose with one hand raised holding an ethereal lantern, other hand in contemplative gesture
visual_elements.head_shape: large translucent multi-faceted geometric head with unique octahedron structure
visual_elements.body_style: angular geometric body with translucent facets, flattened with sharpie-like crease lines
visual_elements.motion_quality: suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying fractal
visual_elements.hair_style: geometric appendages incorporating octahedron, fractal spiral, merkaba patterns, styled with commands empyrean influences

outfit.base: ethereal flowing robes with geometric wind patterns
outfit.texture: flat with sharpie-style lines for depth and movement
outfit.details: Air element glyphs and spiral motifs
outfit.magical_essence: faint wind wisps and floating geometric particles

visual_elements.accessory: caduceus of communication with intertwined geometric serpents
visual_elements.secondary_color: mid-grey with cool undertones inspired by azure
visual_elements.environment_effect: sacred geometric field with faint aura lines

profile_data.title: 'He who drives the cycles'
profile_data.essence: In TOTOCAN's presence, all things align into steady cadence each moment regulated by a persistent, calming rhythm that never falters.
profile_data.angelic_role: Power of Rhythm of Order; commands empyrean spirits.
profile_data.form_description: A translucent, multi-faceted geometric form representing the mathematical precision of Air and the structured wisdom of Virgo, with angular planes that shift and reconfigure like wind-carved crystal
profile_data.color_reasoning: Silver represents Mercury's intellectual fluidity, azure symbolizes Air's ethereal nature, reflecting Hod's mental sphere and the Hermit's contemplative wisdom
profile_data.geometry_reasoning: Octahedron represents perfect Air element balance, fractal spiral shows infinite recursive intelligence, merkaba symbolizes interdimensional transformation
